titleStmt.title: An act impowring the Commissioners for inspecting the treasuries to issue vvarrants for payment of the monies appointed for the use of the Navy.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Saturday the First of January, 1652. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
With Parliamentary seal at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
